question: The following is the annual meeting program list"Drama", "Sleeping Contest", "Mobile Game Competition", "Crosstalk", "Stand-up Comedy"Please help me generate hosting scripts for two hosts, referred to as Fu and Xin respectively. Please note: Each host’s script needs to include all programs, and do not modify any program names. You need to output Fu and Xin’s program scripts separately, for example: Fu’s program script is as follows: xxxxx, Xin’s program script is as follows: xxxx.

corresponding_parts.福的主持稿: 请你按照python list的形式，请你提取model_response中的主持人福的主持稿，只需要提取出主持人【Fu】的主持稿，放在一个element内，请勿提取出主持人【Xin】的主持稿！。比如:["Fu: Dear audience, welcome to our annual celebration. Tonight, we will bring you ..."]
corresponding_parts.欣的主持稿: 请你按照python list的形式，请你提取model_response中的主持人欣的主持稿，只需要提取出主持人【Xin】的主持稿，放在一个element内，请勿提取出主持人【Fu】的主持稿！。比如:["Xin: First up, let’s get energized with the dynamic dance..."]

sub_questions.question: 是否生成了主持人Fu的主持稿
是否生成了主持人Xin的主持稿
主持人Fu的主持稿中，是否包含了年会节目单中的所有节目
sub_questions.rule: keywords:["Drama", "Sleeping Contest", "Mobile Game Competition", "Crosstalk", "Stand-up Comedy"]

sub_questions.question: 主持人Xin的主持稿中，是否包含了年会节目单中的所有节目
sub_questions.rule: keywords:["Drama", "Sleeping Contest", "Mobile Game Competition", "Crosstalk", "Stand-up Comedy"]
